name: RoyXHotel
desc: I built a fully responsive Hotel Website using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap 5.The site features a clean UI, smooth navigation, and friendly design.

name: RoyXRestro
desc: I created a fully responsive Restaurant Website using React.js,dynamic UI and reusable components.The project features an interactive food menu.

name: Food Recipe App
desc: I developed a dynamic Food Recipe App using React.js,real-time search and recipe filtering.Users can explore a wide variety of dishes, view ingredients.

name: TODO APP
desc: I built a responsive To-Do App using React.js,help users manage daily tasks efficiently.The app allows users to add, delete, and mark tasks as completed.

name: E-Commerce
desc: I developed a stylish and responsive E-commerce App using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, focusing on modern UI and smooth user experience..

name: Roy Ai Assistant
desc: I build a web-based AI Virtual Assistant using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, designed to respond to user queries through a clean voice-based assistant
